original_text: He is swift as the waters; their portion is cursed in the earth: he beholdeth not the way of the vineyards.
korean_text: 그들은 물 위에 빨리 흘러가고 그들의 소유는 세상에서 저주를 받나니 그들이 다시는 포도원 길로 다니지 못할 것이라

sentences.original_text: He is swift as the waters
their portion is cursed in the earth
he beholdeth not the way of the vineyards
